items.title: Description
items.description: A short description of the item.

maxPrice.title: Max Price
maxPrice.description: The highest price if the price is a range.

minPrice.title: Min Price
minPrice.description: The lowest price if the price is a range.

price.title: Price
price.description: The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

priceCurrency.title: Price Currency
priceCurrency.description: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the offer price or a price component, when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

validFrom.title: Valid From
validFrom.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

validThrough.title: Valid Through
validThrough.description: The end of the validity of offer, price specification, or opening hours data.

valueAddedTaxIncluded.title: Value Added Tax Included
valueAddedTaxIncluded.description: Specifies whether the applicable value-added tax (VAT) is included in the price specification or not.
